hero.headline: Hi, I'm Ollie.
hero.subheadline: I'm a full-stack marketer who builds the systems, content and automations that help teams scale without burning out.

content.title: Ollie Pinto
content.bio: Creative meets systems. I help marketing teams run smoothly, so there's less firefighting and more room for strategy.

content.title: Creative Background
content.text: Started making YouTube videos in 2009. Built my career through video, then design, then UX, then into marketing, where I am today. Each chapter added to the toolkit. Now I use AI to go deeper into technical work I couldn't do alone.

content.desc: Final project: Drops Music - a mobile app concept. Designed the UI, built an animated prototype, and directed video content to bring it to life.

content.title: Personal Interests
content.text: FPL obsessive. Chelsea supporter. Into mindfulness, reading, music, podcasts, and the messy overlap of AI and everyday life.

content.title: Living Prototype
content.label: Currently Writing
content.description: Thoughts on work, life, and how AI is reshaping the way we do both.

work.headline: Experience Archive
work.subheadline: A timeline of roles, projects, and the things I've shipped.

projects.short_desc: Built automations and content systems that helped marketing scale.
full_desc: Drove consistent YoY growth in social impressions and engagement. Shaped tone of voice, ran performance standups, and turned insights into optimisations, earning strong client feedback.

Built a multi-step lead triage automation: filters spam, generates AI-powered company summaries, scores leads against ICP, and routes qualified prospects to Slack in real time. Significantly reduced noise for the sales team.
Created custom AI tools for the marketing team, contextualised for ICP fit, tone of voice, and proposition alignment.
Managed WordPress CMS and implemented cost-saving CRM solutions for email marketing.

projects.short_desc: Helped secure $1.1m revenue for Sky Broadband Gaming Plan.
full_desc: Coordinated the new website build, writing copy and optimising SEO.
Developed B2B strategy, including investor newsletters and a LinkedIn content cadence.
Built a custom AI tone-of-voice tool to keep brand messaging consistent at scale.
Led social activity for the Sky partnership, contributing to 80.6m impressions.

projects.short_desc: Supported a major B2B rebrand for the Private Credit business line.
full_desc: Played a key role in the B2B rebrand of the Private Credit business line.
Ran campaigns that increased investor engagement.
Managed suppliers for video, webinar, and presentation production.
Supported digital marketing: website UX/SEO improvements and LinkedIn campaign management.

projects.short_desc: Streamlined procurement and refreshed brand assets for a rebrand.
full_desc: Streamlined procurement workflows, including supplier liaison and invoice logging.
Updated brand templates ahead of a planned rebrand.

Delivered high-fidelity prototypes that strengthened the company's pitch to retailers and investors.

projects.short_desc: Assisted the Promotions team at Universal Music Group record label.
full_desc: Handled travel requisitions and department data entry.
Booked travel and assisted talent appearing on This Morning.
